next.title: Keychron K1 Wireless Mechanical Keyboard (Version 5)
next.summary: Keychron K1 is an ultra-slim wireless mechanical keyboard. With Gateron low profile red, blue, brown switch. Wireless and type-c wired mode. Mac layout, compatible with Mac, Windows. Aluminum frame. 18 types of RGB backlight included white LED.
